title: Incorrect "Build" popup action enablement
description: The "Build" action in the context-sensitive popup menu in the Java perspective is always enabled, even if the user has selected "Perform build automatically on resource modification" in the Preferences Workbench. This behavior is incorrect.
OB: The "Build" action in the context-sensitive popup menu in the Java perspective is always enabled, even if the user has not enabled automatic build in the Preferences Workbench.
EB: The "Build" action in the context-sensitive popup menu in the Java perspective should only be enabled if the user has not enabled automatic build in the Preferences Workbench.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the Java perspective.
2. Go to Preferences -> Workbench.
3. Select "Perform build automatically on resource modification".
4. Right-click in the Java perspective and observe that the "Build" option is still enabled in the context-sensitive popup menu.
